name: Blowgun Training
benefit: You gain proficiency with the blowgun. You can reload a blowgun as a free action, you increase a blowgunâ€™s range to 10/20, and you treat a blowgun as a high critical weapon. If you are a rogue, you can use the blowgun with the Sneak Attack class feature and any rogue ranged attack power that can be used with a crossbow or sling.
